name: Crowne Plaza Yantai Seaview

reviews.text: Nice new hotel facing the ocean. It's a long way from downtown, but it's right next to the international exhibition center. The taxi ride downtown follows the seashore and is quite pleasant.
reviews.title: Room with seaview and room for improvement too

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Modern room with free wifi and a wonderful bed. Huge, mostly empty lobby. The staff is friendly, but have poor English skills and overall seem to be a bit undertrained for an international-branded hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent views and safe location
ok to go
reviews.text: The main dining area on the first floor serves good breakfasts and has a pretty decent dinner buffet, great value. Stay away from the revolving restaurant on the 47, though. Bland asian and indian fare. The floor moves a bit too quickly and the window frames hold the sparkling rainbow-colored neons that flash non-stop on the outside. Odd, dizzy environment indeed.

description: The 47-story Crowne Plaza Yantai Sea View is located along the beautiful coastline of Yantai, wonderfully designed to satisfy the needs of both business and leisure travelers.
